mapper.sql: id, date, model, model_other, stock_name, type, instructions
mapper.select:
SELECT * from ( SELECT rc.type,mo.attr,mo.behaviour ,mo.name,cd.date,cd.week, m.bidding,m.sse_bidding,m.key_words,m.market_trends, rc.stock_name, CONCAT('昨日:',IFNULL(b2.instructions,''),'---今日:',IFNULL(b.instructions,'')) instructions FROM relation_conf rc inner JOIN conf_date cd ON cd.date = rc.date left JOIN base_market m ON m.date = rc.date left JOIN conf_model_other mo ON mo.conf = rc.model_other left JOIN base_stock b2 ON b2.stock_name =rc.stock_name AND b2.create_date = (SELECT MAX(DATE) FROM conf_Date WHERE rc.date >DATE AND TYPE IN (0)) inner join base_stock b on b.stock_name =rc.stock_name and b.create_date = cd.date
union all
SELECT rc.type,md.attr,md.behaviour ,md.name,cd.date,cd.week, m.bidding,m.sse_bidding,m.key_words,m.market_trends, rc.stock_name,rc.instructions FROM relation_conf rc inner JOIN conf_date cd ON cd.date = rc.date left JOIN base_market m ON m.date = rc.date inner JOIN conf_model_detail md ON md.model_detail_type = rc.model ) a where date>= #{date} order by DATE,name desc
